mapper.select: SELECT t.ID, t.ddtimestamp, t.languagePoint, t.locationProvince, t.locationCity, t.locationCounty, t.locationTown, t.locationVillage, t.locationDetial, t.name, t.birthday, t.sex, t.education, t.usedLanguage, t.tel, t.profession, t.contactAddress, t.remarks FROM dialectdetial t
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dialectdetial( ddtimestamp, languagePoint, locationProvince, locationCity, locationCounty, locationTown, locationVillage, locationDetial, name, birthday, sex, education, usedLanguage, tel, profession, contactAddress, remarks ) VALUES( #{ddtimestamp}, #{languagePoint}, #{locationProvince}, #{locationCity}, #{locationCounty}, #{locationTown}, #{locationVillage}, #{locationDetial}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{education}, #{usedLanguage}, #{tel}, #{profession}, #{contactAddress}, #{remarks} )
